snippet: Wall Street had a lackluster day as tepid response to a Spanish bond sale heightened fears about funding difficulties for weaker euro zone countries.
abstract: Stocks are mostly lower as tepid response to a Spanish bond sale heightens fears about funding difficulties for weaker euro zone countries.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street had a lackluster day as tepid response to a Spanish bond sale heightened fears about funding difficulties for weaker euro zone countries.

headline.main: Markets Mixed on Fears About Europe
headline.print_headline: Markets Mixed on Fears About Europe
